scripts.build-ui: cp src/color-manipulator.js docs/lib/color-manipulator/color-manipulator.js && cp src/color-calculator-parser.js docs/lib/color-manipulator/color-calculator-parser.js && cp docs/index.1.html docs/index.html
scripts.build-parser: npx pegjs --format globals --export-var ColorCalculatorParser --output src/color-calculator-parser.js src/color-calculator-parser.pegjs
